title: Investigate where to reuse SKSurface in the views
body:
### Description

It appears the constructing a `SKSurface` is expensive, so we should see if we can reuse instances across draws.

Here is PR that was created to improve drawing: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/534

> VS bug [#736294](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/736294)
